review_data.title: very good sushi
review_data.content: went there several times, and i have to mention that the quality is always very good. i like the ambiance,and the choice between a la carte and the running sushi belt.

review_data.title: great lunch
review_data.content: Great place for lunch – even if you are in a bit of a hurry. You can either have a selection bento box or pick and choose the food you want dish by dish. Reasonable price for Switzerland.

review_data.title: Solid Sushi
review_data.content: A typical restaurant Sushi chain, but quite solid. No big surprises, but you get nice sushi and rolls. They have a running Sushi or you can choose a la carte.
